backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user authentication, profiles, and chat messages with access control and blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a frontend login‑error‑handling requirement to specific files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing roles of all major frontend files including hooks, pages, components, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom OKLCH color tokens for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entrypoint loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Selects login or chat screen based on password session state and wraps the app with theming and toasts.
frontend/src/auth/usePasswordSession.ts: Zustand‑persisted store holding username/password and authentication state.
frontend/src/components/GalleryModal.tsx: Modal displaying shared media with an inline viewer supporting images, video, and audio.
frontend/src/components/MessageBubble.ts: Renders an individual chat bubble with media handling and audio playback controls.
Message input bar supporting text, file uploads, and audio recording for voice notes.
frontend/src/components/MessageList.tsx: Renders chat messages with date separators and displays each message using MessageBubble.
frontend/src/components/ProfileModal.tsx: Modal for editing a user profile, including status text and uploading a profile picture.
frontend/src/components/RoomChatHeader.t: Displays current and other user info with avatars and a dropdown menu for profile, gallery, and logout actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, and stored identity handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for login, fetching profiles, messages, and updating profiles or sending messages.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom space-themed color variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/LoginScreen.tsx: Provides a styled login form that authenticates via useLogin and saves the session using usePasswordSession.
frontend/src/pages/RoomChatScreen.tsx: Displays the main chat room with messages, header actions, auto-scroll, and profile/gallery modals.
frontend/src/utils/dateFormat.ts: Contains helpers for formatting timestamps and generating date keys for grouping messages.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage fallback.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, themes, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Describes the project state, requirements, known issues, and existing features for the Milky Way chat app.
